msbt.message: These are so totally some of my favorite clothes!Do you like the clothes you're wearing, ?
Of course!
They're good enough.
I wouldn't miss them.
I thought so! Because the clothes you have on now really suit you!When it comes to fashion I. Know. Everything.

Just good enough? Really? I think you're always wearing super trendy clothes!In factyou're getting a little TOO fashionable.I guess I need to up my game if I'm going to keep my title of Most Fash Ever!
Really? I was for sure positive you loved those clothes!Well, you might not like them, but you make them look good! You're, like, a fashion guru!
Hey, ? What do you think would look best on me?
Skinny jeans. Shorts. Overalls.
Flare skirt. Pleated skirt. Tulle skirt.
No idea.
Duh! Right? A skirt is nice, but I could totes rock something different instead!Maybe I'll try something a little more mod!
A skirt! Of course! If you're going to be a pop star like me, you just have to have a fave fab skirt!
It's tough, isn't it? I legit cannot decide!But you know what? I shouldn't try to wear what other folks say to wear. I'll just wear what I want!Hang ondidn't I just ask you?

I've been reading some super old magazines and they're FULL of fab personality tests. Let's do one now!'K. Imagine, if you will, that you can hear music coming from the house of someone you likeWhat kind of music would you want it to be?
Classical.
Rock.
Pop.
Music box.

Hmmclassical, eh? That means you should marrysomeone who's as calming as a string quartet and as EXCITING as brass and drums!Surprised I know classical music? A pop star needs to know more than just pop! And classical's WAY neat!

Rock, huh, ? You'd probs like somebody with a "wild side"!You two could rock all day for free! Party for nothing! And keep believing!<10_4 /> Or something.I've listened to a lot of old rock albums and I love them all. I just confuse the lyrics sometimes!

Pop? Who even likes pop music? I mean, come onI'm kidding! Pop music is awesome! It's fab! It's trendy! It's chic! It's<10_10 />THE BEST THING EVER!<10_11 />If you love pop music, you need someone like me!<10_4 /> Not actually ME, though My heart belongs to K.K.!

Music box music, huh?If you heard a music box from outside someone's house, then that's one loud music box!I guess the true love of your life would be someone who had a music box hooked up to a sound systemWhich could be pretty neat!
Buckle up, ! I'm going to give yooou a personality test!OKif you were going to go to a costume party with a friendwhat kind of costume would you wear?
A black-cat costume!
A vampire costume!
Some full-body tights!
A pumpkin costume!

'K, did you know that your costume choice affects how folks see you?You picked a black-cat costume, right? Well, folks would see you assomeone wearing PAW-jamas!Get it? <10_4 />Becausecat costume? And catshave paws?<10_4 /> You don't get it.

'K, did you know that your costume choice affects how folks see you?You picked a vampire, sofolks would see you asa really bad chef!Get it? <10_4 />Becausechefs use garlic? And vampireshate garlic?<10_4 /> You don't get it.

'K, did you know your costume choice affects how folks see you?Now, you picked full-body tights? Well, folks would see you as a person in tights!I admit I thought that was a funny joke right up until I said it. Heh.

'K, did you know that your costume choice affects how folks see you?You picked a pumpkin costume, right? Well, folks would see youas a big-time pumpkin head, with a pumpkin for a head!Get it? II don't get it either.<10_4 /> I couldn't think of a good pumpkin joke.
Going out is more fun when your hair is fashionably glam!Do you think your current hairstyle is tr√®s fab or le drab, ?
Totally fab!
Totally drab?
Fab? Drab? What?
You ARE totally fab! I'm so glad you think so too!You know, I need to keep up with your style Maybe I'll try a new hairdo!
What? Don't be rude to yourself like that! I think your hair looks super!You know, I think any hairstyle would look good on you. But me? My stylist EARNS their paycheck!

You don't know hairstyle terms? Well, bestie, your hair is amazing. A total 10 out of 10out of 10!But if you want to be a fashion icon like I'm going to be, you'll have to work hard.You need to be able to style your hair two, three, or even eight times a day!That reminds me! I've had this look for more than an hour! I have some styling to do!
